front.title: Media Independent Handover Network Signalling Layer Protocol (MIH NSLP)

abstract.t: This memo defines the Media Independent Handover Network Signalling Layer Protocol (MIH NSLP) for the transport of messages from the IEEE 802.21 standard using the Next Steps in Signalling (NSIS) framework. The MIH NSLP is responsible for the transport of MIH messages to remote entities reporting on link layer information, in order to support seamless mobility in heterogeneous environments. A usage example of the MIH NSLP is also provided.
